attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Well It Would Be Pretty Fun Though If You Gotta Admit. No One Wants A Brown Potatoe, Top, Shows, Whatever Really. Make It More Intresting, More Livened Up, Like Lime Green, Red. So Id Really Like Peoples To Change The Genetic Colours Of The Browness Into LIME GREEN.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
